title: Ikiru
description: Kanji Watanabe is a middle-aged man who has worked in the same monotonous bureaucratic position for decades. Learning he has cancer, he starts to look for the meaning of his life.

reviews.text: heartwrenching, yet cautionary tale about death and life, worth a watch if you havent seen it
great film, that gives a lot of emotions and let us think about how good the life is
An emotional heartbreaking tale of the final months of a man with cancer. A true foreign classic!
